Package utilities.controllers

package utilities.controllers
  • Class
    Description
    AccountController
    JavaFX controller for the Account screen.
    ChangePasswordController
    JavaFX controller for handling user password changes.
    createDeckController
    A class to handle the create deck page in the app, fit with a back button and links to create different deck types.
    createDocumentController
     
    createKeywordController
     
    createPDFController
    A class to handle the create PDF page in the app, fit with a back button and an open file button for deck creation.
    DashboardController
    JavaFX controller for the main Dashboard.
    DeckInfoController
    JavaFX controller for handling deck information submission.
    DeckInfoPopupController
    JavaFX controller for the Deck Info popup dialog.
    DeckInfoPopupController.Callback
    Callback interface to handle submission of deck info.
    EditFieldPopupController
    JavaFX controller for a generic field editing popup window.
    EditFieldPopupController.Callback
    Callback interface to return the edited value to the calling context.
    LoginController
    JavaFX controller responsible for user login.
    LoginHistoryController
    JavaFX controller for displaying the login history of a user.
